quotes: Mohamed T. El-Ashry obtained his Bachelor of Science degree in 1959 from the University of Cairo
Mohamed T. El-Ashry obtained his Master of Science in 1963 and Doctor of Philosophy in Geology, in 1966, from the University of Illinois
Mohamed T. El-Ashry obtained his Master of Science in 1963 and Doctor of Philosophy in Geology, in 1966, from the University of Illinois
He later joined World Bank where he held the position of Chief Environmental Advisor (1991–1993)
He later joined World Bank where he held the position of Chief Environmental Advisor to the President (1993–1994)
He later joined World Bank where he held the position of Chief Executive Officer and Chairman (1994–2003)
From World Bank, he joined Global Environment Facility (GEF) where he became the CEO and Chairman of the organisation for eleven years (1991-2002)
a Fellow of the Third World Academy of Sciences in 1990
and a Fellow of the African Academy of Sciences in 2001
He is a member of the American Academy of Arts and Sciences since 2012 advising on renewable energy
T.; Tribune, International Herald (2000-08-22).
"The Renewable Energy Era Has Already Started" . New Security Beat . 2015-11-05 .
El-Ashry, Mohamed T. (2012). "National Policies to Promote Renewable Energy" . Daedalus . 141 (2): 105–110.
Retrieved 2022-11-27.
World Wildlife Fund . Retrieved 2022-11-23.
